- Location: Column 11
- Date: Trajan 
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna003.pdf#page=264){target="_blank"}- Bibliography: @sauneron-5, pp. 200; see also [Tempeltexte 2.0](http://www.tempeltexte.uni-tuebingen.de/portal/#/text-detail/1157){target="_blank"}

<div class="col2">  

^15^ *ky dwȝ ẖnmw  *  
*ḏd-mdw  *  
    
*ỉȝw n=k pȝ ẖnmw  *  
*qdỉ nṯry  *  
*ḫp(r) m pȝwty.w  *  
      
*ḥmww nfr  *  
*mȝȝ r p(ȝ) wḫȝ n rsy-ỉmnty  *  
  
^15^ Another hymn of Khnum.  
Words spoken:  
  
Praise unto you, o Khnum,  
the divine potter,  
who came about with the Primeval ones.  
  
Good craftsman...   
(look to the column to the south-west).  
  
</div>
  
This short hymn continues in [Esna 390].
